name: Orb Cave Explorer
description:
In this game you explore a small cave and solve puzzles to find a treasure. Made for Godot Wild Jam #46. My first game with orthogonal view and actual puzzle elements and transition of levels/stages. I hope you enjoy playing :)

Move around with WSAD and interact with items and orbs with "F". Also, the character always looks at your mouse cursor.

Idea, Programming and Art/3D Assets and music by Oatmilkrocket. Font and some sound effects, as well as particle textures are from Kenney.nl
